name: Mrs. Pomp helps Baldi
description:
Story: Mrs. Pomp was tired of you being late for class, so she asked baldi if she can help him catch you, and baldi agreed. As usual, collect the 7 notebooks and exit the school to stop this teacher chaos.

Credits:

SplintaDinta for the baldi and mrs.pomp models.

Superinky for the bully and first prize models.

Uberduck for the baldi, mrs.pomp, and bully texts to speech.

SadColoredMods for drawing playtime, and for helping me with making the vending machines glow.
